title: Tomato and apple chutney
ingredients: ['1 kg ripe tomatoes, skinned', '1 kg cooking apples, peeled and cored', '450g onions', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '400ml malt or cider vinegar', '300g demerara or light muscovado sugar', '225g sultanas', '2 tsp salt', '15g whole pickling spices, e.g. a mixture of allspice berries, dried chillies, ginger, celery seeds and peppercorns, tied in a muslin bag (optional)']
